message.content:
I need to identify the value of carrying amount of inventories sold during the reporting period.

In an income statement, the "carrying amount of inventories sold" is typically represented as "Cost of Goods Sold" (COGS). This line item represents the cost of inventory that was sold to customers during the period.

Looking at the income statement provided, I can see:
- "Cost of Goods Sold" with an amount of 6290000.00 on 2024-01-30

Therefore, the carrying amount of inventories sold during the reporting period is 6290000.00.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '6290000.00'} }
```
